Posts.Content: Thank you Sue for your kind words and encouragement they are greatly appreciated... I know there are way too many of us going through this and it is very scary, I have many friends and family saying prayers I am a firm believer that prayer works the more the better God is listening he knows....sending hugs and prayers for you as well....Belinda
Posts.Title: Worried......

Posts.Content: Hi i am new to this forum but would like some advice or suggestions I am 47 my mother passed away at 54 with breast cancer in 96 I went to my doc just for a check up she sent me for a mammogram and apparently I have a 6mm lump in my right breast, They want to schedule me for a sonogram asap since i have history I am having a really tough time with this because of my history....I am scared that with the lump being 6mm it is large and may be found late any suggestions or comments I will appreciate I am scared to death here....ugh
Posts.Title: Worried......

Posts.Content: Thank you all for you comments I had a diagnostic mammogram and a sonogram yesterday 08/27/14 the radiologist seems to think that it is just a cluster of cysts however he said he would do a biopsy if it would make me feel better instead of just coming back in 6 months for a follow up mammogram....I chose the biopsy I told him unless he could tell me with 100% for sure I would feel better if he would just do the biopsy to be sure...he said no problem so now I am waiting for my doctors office to get the cert...will know more after the biopsy...thank you all again I will continue to keep positive thoughts for all of us and prayers...good luck
Posts.Title: Worried......

Posts.Content: Thank you all for your support. The biopsy came back as just cysts I follow up in a year....continued prayers for you all....
